data.title: The Poseidon Adventure vs The Towering Inferno: Part 1 | Clash Of The Titles - a movie podcast!
meta_keywords: Clash Of The Titles - a movie podcast!
data.meta_description: Listen to The Poseidon Adventure vs The Towering Inferno: Part 1 from Clash Of The Titles - a movie podcast! . January blues may have got a hold of you but let’s be honest, your life could be worse… You could be in one of these disaster films! In the red corner we have 1972’s The Poseidon Adventure, while squaring up in the blue corner is 1974’s The Towering Inferno.In today’s episode, the ocean liner SS Poseidon is travelling from New York City to Athens. The new owner's representative insists Captain Harrison must go full speed despite his safety concerns. It’s the SS Poseidon’s last voyage before it’s scrapped… But will it make it?***Please rate and review us on Apple, Spotify or wherever you get your pods. It means a lot and makes it easy for other people to find us. Thank you!***
data.text:
January blues may have got a hold of you but let’s be honest, your life could be worse… You could be in one of these disaster films! In the red corner we have 1972’s The Poseidon Adventure, while squaring up in the blue corner is 1974’s The Towering Inferno.

In today’s episode, the ocean liner SS Poseidon is travelling from New York City to Athens. The new owner's representative insists Captain Harrison must go full speed despite his safety concerns. It’s the SS Poseidon’s last voyage before it’s scrapped… But will it make it?

***Please rate and review us on Apple, Spotify or wherever you get your pods. It means a lot and makes it easy for other people to find us. Thank you!***
